{{short description|2016 Mythopoeic Society conference}}
{{convention|image=|title=Mythcon 47|location=Omni Hotel at the Colonnade, San Antonio, Texas|organizer=[[Mythopoeic Society]]|dates=5 August - 8 August [[2016]]|attendees=|previous=[[Mythcon 46]]|next=[[Mythcon 48]]}}'''Mythcon 47''' was the forty-seventh annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference.

*'''Theme:''' "Faces of Mythology: Ancient, Medieval, and Modern"
*'''Guests of Honor:''' Midori Snyder (fantasy author), and Andrew Lazo (Inklings scholar)
